tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
quoteText:
Retention period

Moodle Pty Ltd will processes different forms of personal data for as long as is necessary and proportionate for the purpose for which it has been supplied and will store the personal data for the shortest amount of time possible, taking into account legal and service requirements.
